original_title: Ghosts of Great Britain Collection: Haunted Cotswolds
overview: Terrifying, true-life tales of ghouls and the undead are woven into fascinating footage of the premiere historic sites and ancient architecture of the Cotswolds. The ghostly elements that lurk just beneath this area's rolling hills and lush vistas are revealed through seven captivating stories
title: Ghosts of Great Britain Collection: Haunted Cotswolds
